channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Quantum Supremacy: The GPT-1 Moment Of Computing's Next Revolution
item.description: If quantum is three to five years behind AI in technology development, is 2025 the equivalent of what 2022 was for AI?

item.title: What’s for breakfast?
item.description: Peter Drucker didn’t say “culture eats strategy for breakfast,” but reality rarely gets in the way of a good quote. But what does it mean? I think wha...

item.title: Analysis = Facts + Interpretation
item.description: If you fail to show us the facts, it’s difficult to accept your analysis. While it’s tempting to simply share an interpretation of what’s happening, c...

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Omits Important Android Feature, Report Claims
item.description: Google’s new Android Linux Terminal app could let you run Linux apps on your smartphone, but not on Samsung devices.

item.title: Getting clear about brand value
item.description: Consulting firms rank brands on value. Marketers promise to increase it. But brand value has little to do with whether a company is famous or even pro...

item.title: Hackers Are Using Google To Steal Microsoft Passwords
item.description: New research reveals how hackers are using Google to attack Microsoft passwords. Here’s everything you need to know and do.

item.title: What sort of progress?

item.title: Organizing for urgent

item.title: Technology As A Healthcare Equalizer: Closing The Digital Divide

item.title: The Evolving Strategic Security Role Of The Chief Data Officer
item.description: Through my work, I’ve observed a notable shift in the responsibilities of chief data officers (CDOs) in Latin America.
